attributes.action: make owners responsible for their own dog's behaviour and not the breed in general
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition will stop specific breeds of dogs being persecuted and ostracized through the irresponsibility of their owners. It is intended to make the owner accountable for their dogs' actions and not the breed collectively. Punish the deed not the breed.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make owners responsible for their own dog's behaviour and not the breed in general."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12895.asp

Prime Minister's Office
